alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Knox; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 14 at 7:00PM CDT until August 14 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Knox County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Anderson County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Union County in east Tennessee... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 800 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clinton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clinton, Maynardville, Plainview, Halls, Rocky Top, Norris, Andersonville, Maloneyville, Paulette, and Big Ridge State Park. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 115 and 127. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
